summary: "Twelfth Night" is a funny play by William Shakespeare, written around 1601-1602 for a special event at the end of the Christmas season. It's about twins Viola and Sebastian, who get separated during a shipwreck. Viola, dressed as a boy named Cesario, falls in love with Duke Orsino, who loves Countess Olivia. But when Olivia meets Viola, she falls in love with her, thinking she's a man. It's a big mix-up! The play was first performed in 1602 and published later in 1623.
title: Twelfth Night
